Class ScriptModuleSpec

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.netflix.nicobar.core.archive.ScriptModuleSpec

extends java.lang.Object
    Common configuration elements for converting a ScriptArchive to a module.

      • getMetadata

        public java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> getMetadata()
        Returns:
        Application specific metadata about this archive. This metadata will be transferred to the Module after it's been created

      • getModuleDependencies

        public java.util.Set<ModuleId> getModuleDependencies()
        Returns:
        the names of the modules that this archive depends on

      • getCompilerPluginIds

        public java.util.Set<java.lang.String> getCompilerPluginIds()
        Returns:
        the string IDs of the compiler plugins that should process this archive

      • getAppImportFilterPaths

        @Nullable
public java.util.Set<java.lang.String> getAppImportFilterPaths()
        Returns:
        the paths imported into the module from the app classloader. If this is null, it indicates that no filter is to be applied (accepts all).

      • getModuleImportFilterPaths

        @Nullable
public java.util.Set<java.lang.String> getModuleImportFilterPaths()
        Returns:
        the paths imported into the module from dependencies If this is null, it indicates that no filter is to be applied (accepts all).

      • getModuleExportFilterPaths

        @Nullable
public java.util.Set<java.lang.String> getModuleExportFilterPaths()
        Returns:
        the paths exported to all modules from dependencies of this module If this is null, it indicates that no filter is to be applied (accepts all).
